trans-unit.source: Exposes a <xref:System.IO.Stream> around a named pipe, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: Viser en <xref:System.IO.Stream>rundt en navngitt datakanal støtter både synkrone og asynkrone lese og skrive operasjoner.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients.
trans-unit.target: Navngitte datakanaler angi enveis eller dobbeltsidig datakanaler for kommunikasjon mellom en datakanalserveren og én eller flere datakanalklienter.

trans-unit.source: Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network.
trans-unit.target: Kan brukes navngitte datakanaler for interprosesskommunikasjon lokalt eller via et nettverk.

trans-unit.source: A single pipe name can be shared by multiple <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream> objects.
trans-unit.target: En enkelt datakanalnavnet kan deles av flere <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>objekter.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream>

trans-unit.source: Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both.
trans-unit.target: En prosess kan fungere som en navngitt datakanal-server eller klient eller begge deler.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/add/includes/winxppro-md.md)] og [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/add/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], maksimalt 10 datakanaler kan koble seg over nettverket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe name.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> klassen med navnet datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object that has the following characteristics: - A default pipe direction of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>objektet som har følgende egenskaper:-datakanalen Standardretning for <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeDirection> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: - The maximum number of server instances that share the same name set to 1.
trans-unit.target: -Maksimalt antall serverforekomster som deler det samme navnet som er satt til 1.

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>Verdien for <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions> value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>Verdien for <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions>

trans-unit.source: - Default input and output buffer sizes.
trans-unit.target: – Standard inndata- og utdataattributter bufferstørrelser.

trans-unit.source: - No pipe security.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen datakanalen sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> value of <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>Verdien for <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>

trans-unit.source: - No specified additional <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen angitte ekstra <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: pipeName is .
trans-unit.target: pipeNameis .

trans-unit.source: pipeName is a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: pipeNameer en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: pipeName is set to "anonymous".
trans-unit.target: pipeNameer satt til "anonym".

trans-unit.source: pipeName contains a colon (":").
trans-unit.target: pipeNameinneholder et kolon (":").

trans-unit.target: Operativsystemet er installasjonen, Windows 98 eller Windows 95, noe ikke som støttes.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: Det maksimale antallet serverforekomster er overskredet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the pipe is connected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines how to open or create the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som bestemmer hvordan å åpne eller opprette datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: A positive value greater than 0 that indicates the input buffer size.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi som er større enn 0 som angir den angitte bufferstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: A positive value greater than 0 that indicates the output buffer size.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi som er større enn 0 som angir utdatabufferstørrelsen.

trans-unit.target: - eller - direction er ikke et gyldig verdi.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe name, pipe direction, maximum number of server instances, transmission mode, pipe options, recommended in and out buffer sizes, and pipe security.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> med datakanalen Klassenavn, datakanalen retning maksimalt antall serverforekomster, overføringsmodus, datakanalen alternativene, anbefales inn og ut buffer størrelser og datakanal sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object that has the following characteristics: - A default <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> value of <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>objektet som har følgende egenskaper:-en standardverdi <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>for <xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability>.</xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.HandleInheritability> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: - No specified additional <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.
trans-unit.target: – Ingen angitte ekstra <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som bestemmer retningen på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances that share the same name.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall serverforekomster som deler det samme navnet.

trans-unit.source: You can pass <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.MaxAllowedServerInstances"></xref> for this value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan sende <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.MaxAllowedServerInstances"> </xref> for denne verdien.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the transmission mode of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av de nummereringsverdier som angir overføring modusen for datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines how to open or create the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som bestemmer hvordan å åpne eller opprette datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: A positive value greater than 0 that indicates the input buffer size.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi som er større enn 0 som angir den angitte bufferstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: A positive value greater than 0 that indicates the output buffer size.
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi som er større enn 0 som angir utdatabufferstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: An object that determines the access control and audit security for the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som bestemmer tilgangskontroll og overvåking sikkerhet for datakanalen.

trans-unit.target: pipeNameis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe name, pipe direction, maximum number of server instances, transmission mode, pipe options, recommended in and out buffer sizes, pipe security, and inheritability mode.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> klasse datakanalen navn, datakanalen retningen, maksimalt antall serverforekomster overføringsmodus, datakanalen alternativene, anbefales inn og ut bufferstørrelser, datakanalen sikkerhet og inheritability modus.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> class with the specified pipe name, pipe direction, maximum number of server instances, transmission mode, pipe options, recommended in and out buffer sizes, pipe security, inheritability mode, and pipe access rights.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> med datakanalen Klassenavn, datakanalen retning maksimalt antall serverforekomster, overføringsmodus, datakanalen alternativene, anbefales inn og ut buffer størrelser, datakanalen sikkerhet og inheritability modus og datakanal tilgangsrettigheter.

trans-unit.source: The name of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines the direction of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som bestemmer retningen på datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances that share the same name.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall serverforekomster som deler det samme navnet.

trans-unit.source: You can pass <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.MaxAllowedServerInstances"></xref> for this value.

trans-unit.target: En av de nummereringsverdier som angir overføring modusen for datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines how to open or create the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som bestemmer hvordan å åpne eller opprette datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: The input buffer size.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte bufferstørrelsen.

trans-unit.source: The output buffer size.
trans-unit.target: Bufferstørrelsen for utdata.

trans-unit.target: Et objekt som bestemmer tilgangskontroll og overvåking sikkerhet for datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that determines whether the underlying handle can be inherited by child processes.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene for enumeration som bestemmer om den underliggende referansen arves av underordnede prosesser.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the access rights of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: En av opplistingsverdiene som som angir tilgangsrettigheter for datakanalen.

trans-unit.target: pipeNameinneholder et kolon (":").

trans-unit.source: The operating system is Windows Millennium Edition, Windows 98, or Windows 95, which are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Operativsystemet er installasjonen, Windows 98 eller Windows 95, noe ikke som støttes.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of server instances has been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: Det maksimale antallet serverforekomster er overskredet.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to wait for a client to connect.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron operasjon venter en klient kan koble.

trans-unit.source: This is the asynchronous equivalent of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Dette tilsvarer asynkrone <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.EndWaitForConnection%2A> must be called exactly once for every call to BeginWaitForConnection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.EndWaitForConnection%2A>må kalles nøyaktig én gang for hvert kall til BeginWaitForConnection.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.EndWaitForConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method to call when a client connects to the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden for å kalle når en klient kobles til den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: Et gitt objekt som skiller bestemt asynkrone forespørselen fra andre forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: An object that references the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som refererer til asynkron forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The pipe was not opened asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen ble ikke åpnet asynkront.

trans-unit.source: -or- A pipe connection has already been established.
trans-unit.target: - eller en datakanaltilkobling er allerede opprettet.

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: - eller - datakanalen referansen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: Datakanaltilkoblingen er brutt.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Disconnects the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Kobler fra den gjeldende tilkoblingen.

trans-unit.source: Calling the Disconnect method will block until all the sent characters have been read unless the transmission mode of the pipe is set to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode> and the buffer size is set in the constructor that created the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object.
trans-unit.target: Kaller metoden frakobling vil blokkere før alle sendt tegn er lest Hvis overføringsmodus av datakanalen er satt til <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>og bufferstørrelsen er angitt i konstruktøren som opprettes av <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeTransmissionMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, not all of the messages will be received.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet mottas ikke alle meldinger.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.WaitForPipeDrain%2A> causes the server to block until all the data has been read from the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Kaller <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.WaitForPipeDrain%2A>fører til at serveren til å blokkere før alle dataene er lest fra datakanalen.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream.WaitForPipeDrain%2A>

trans-unit.source: No pipe connections have been made yet.
trans-unit.target: Ingen datakanaltilkoblinger er utført ennå.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connected pipe has already disconnected.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tilkoblet datakanalen er koblet allerede.

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: - eller - datakanalen referansen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous operation to wait for a client to connect.
trans-unit.target: Avslutter en asynkron operasjon venter en klient kan koble.

trans-unit.source: EndWaitForConnection must be called exactly once for every call to <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.BeginWaitForConnection%2A>.
trans-unit.target: EndWaitForConnection må kalles nøyaktig én gang for hvert kall til <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.BeginWaitForConnection%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream.BeginWaitForConnection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pending asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: Ventende asynkron forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: asyncResult is .
trans-unit.target: asyncResultis .

trans-unit.source: The pipe was not opened asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen ble ikke åpnet asynkront.

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: - eller - datakanalen referansen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: Datakanaltilkoblingen er brutt.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressurser og til å utføre andre operasjoner for opprydding før den <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> forekomsten gode av datasanering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på klienten med den andre enden av datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: The GetImpersonationUserName method returns `null` if the client has not yet written to the pipe or if the connected client did not connect with a <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> of <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetImpersonationUserName returnerer `null` hvis klienten ikke har ennå skrive til datakanalen eller tilkoblet klienten ikke koblet med en <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>av <xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel> </xref:System.Security.Principal.TokenImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: The user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på klienten med den andre enden av datakanalen.

trans-unit.source: No pipe connections have been made yet.
trans-unit.target: Ingen datakanaltilkoblinger er utført ennå.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connected pipe has already disconnected.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tilkoblet datakanalen er koblet allerede.

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: - eller - datakanalen referansen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: Datakanaltilkoblingen er brutt.

trans-unit.source: -or- The user name of the client is longer than 19 characters.
trans-unit.target: - eller - brukernavnet for klienten er lengre enn 19 tegn.

trans-unit.source: Represents the maximum number of server instances that the system resources allow.
trans-unit.target: Representerer det maksimale antallet serverforekomster som tillater systemressurser.

trans-unit.source: Use the MaxAllowedServerInstances when creating a <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object to set the maximum number of server instances that the system resources allow.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av MaxAllowedServerInstances når du oppretter en <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>objektet for å angi det maksimale antallet serverforekomster som tillater systemressurser.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Calls a delegate while impersonating the client.
trans-unit.target: Kaller representant under representerer klienten.

trans-unit.source: The connecting client's permissions are applied to the remote server.
trans-unit.target: Tilkobling klientens tillatelsene er brukt på den eksterne serveren.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the connecting client tries to request the contents of a file on the server, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis klienten prøver å be om innholdet i en fil på serveren, klienten kan be om bare filer som den har tilstrekkelige tillatelser til å åpne.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that specifies a method to call.
trans-unit.target: Representanten som angir en metode til å kalle.

trans-unit.source: No pipe connections have been made yet.
trans-unit.target: Ingen datakanaltilkoblinger er utført ennå.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connected pipe has already disconnected.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tilkoblet datakanalen er koblet allerede.

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: - eller - datakanalen referansen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: Datakanaltilkoblingen er brutt.

trans-unit.source: -or- An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: - eller - det oppstod en i/u-feil.

trans-unit.source: Waits for a client to connect to this <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Venter på at en klient kan koble til denne <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object to block until a client connects.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden fører til at det <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>objektet til å blokkere til en klient kobler.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: A pipe connection has already been established.
trans-unit.target: En datakanaltilkobling er allerede opprettet.

trans-unit.source: -or- The pipe handle has not been set.
trans-unit.target: - eller - datakanalen referansen er ikke angitt.

trans-unit.source: The pipe is closed.
trans-unit.target: Datakanalen er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The pipe connection has been broken.
trans-unit.target: Datakanaltilkoblingen er brutt.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously waits for a client to connect to this <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront venter på at en klient kan koble til denne <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det er asynkron, denne metoden returnerer umiddelbart, men tilkobling er fullført når klienten ber <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous wait operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone Venteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously waits for a client to connect to this <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"></xref> object and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront venter på at en klient kan koble til denne <xref href="System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream"> </xref> objekt og skjermer avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Fordi det er asynkron, denne metoden returnerer umiddelbart, men tilkobling er fullført når klienten ber <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.ConnectAsync%2A> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream.Connect%2A>

trans-unit.source: Cancellation requests using the cancellation token will only work if the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream> object was created with a pipe option value of <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions?displayProperty=fullName> or if the cancellation occurs before the WaitForConnectionAsync method is called.
trans-unit.target: Avbryte-forespørsler ved hjelp av avbryte tokenet virker bare hvis det <xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>objektet ble opprettet med datakanalen alternativverdien <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions?displayProperty=fullName>eller avbryte forekommer før metoden WaitForConnectionAsync kalles.</xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeOptions?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream>

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å overvåke for å avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous wait operation.
trans-unit.target: En oppgave som representerer den asynkrone Venteoperasjonen.
